parameters: "I am Kuya Jay! A Lasallian Ambassador under the SLIFE! Ready to serve!"
"I bet it's your first day! Maybe you will need some school supplies."
"There is a National Bookstore located at the first floor of the Yuchengco building."
"Walk to the right then go up. It has a flight of stairs outside the building."
"Another LAmb is situated there. She will guide you to the store."
"A quick fun fact! Did you know that this 9-storey building was known before as the St. Athanasius Gym."
"My partner radioed me that you were looking for the National Bookstore."
"(This is not the building I am looking for...)"
"(Kuya Jay told me it has a flight of stairs outside...)"
